long_description: Lace up your boots and head out on more than 400 trails in the ''Triangle'' area of Raleigh, Durham and Chapel Hill. Author: Allen De Hart. Softcover; 298 pages; black-and-white photographs. John F. Blair Publishing; copyright 2007. Updated edition expands coverage to nearly twice as many trails and features highly detailed descriptions. Trails are divided by type of management and each entry features a brief description, directions, management contact information and adjoining map. Also lists suggested mountain bike and equestrian trails.
short_description: Lace up your boots and head out on more than 400 trails in the ''Triangle'' area of Raleigh, Durham and Chapel Hill.
